scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run app
scripts.build: sudo rm -rf ./dist && npm run compile && electron-packager ./app Novelist --all --version=1.4.11 --out=./dist --prune=false
scripts.build:osx: sudo rm -rf ./dist && npm run compile && electron-packager ./app Novelist --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.4.11 --out=./dist --prune=false
